00022 #include "mt/proto/smpp/pdu/broadcast_sm.hpp"
00023 
00026 Smpp::BroadcastSm::BroadcastSm() :
00027     Request(CommandLength(MinLength),
00028     CommandId(CommandId::BroadcastSm),
00029     SequenceNumber::Min),
00030     defaultBroadcastAreaIdentifier_(true)
00031 {
00032     // The command_length is automatically updated
00033     insert_tlv(BroadcastAreaIdentifier(0x00, 0, 0));
00034     insert_tlv(BroadcastContentType(0x00, 0x0000));
00035     insert_16bit_tlv(Smpp::Tlv::broadcast_rep_num, 0x0000);
00036     insert_tlv(BroadcastFrequencyInterval(0x00, 0x0000));
00037 }
00038 
00055 Smpp::BroadcastSm::BroadcastSm(
00056         const SequenceNumber& sequenceNumber,
00057         const ServiceType& serviceType,
00058         const SmeAddress& sourceAddr,
00059         const MessageId& messageId,
00060         const PriorityFlag& priorityFlag,
00061         const Smpp::Time& scheduleDeliveryTime,
00062         const Smpp::Time& validityPeriod,
00063         const ReplaceIfPresentFlag& replaceIfPresentFlag,
00064         const DataCoding& dataCoding,
00065         const SmDefaultMsgId& smDefaultMsgId,
00066         const BroadcastAreaIdentifier& broadcastAreaIdentifier,
00067         const BroadcastContentType& broadcastContentType,
00068         const Smpp::Uint16& broadcastRepNum,
00069         const BroadcastFrequencyInterval& broadcastFrequencyInterval) :
00070     Request(CommandLength(MinLength),
00071              CommandId(CommandId::BroadcastSm),
00072              sequenceNumber),
00073     service_type_(serviceType),
00074     source_addr_(sourceAddr),
00075     message_id_(messageId),
00076     priority_flag_(priorityFlag),
00077     schedule_delivery_time_(scheduleDeliveryTime),
00078     validity_period_(validityPeriod),
00079     replace_if_present_flag_(replaceIfPresentFlag),
00080     data_coding_(dataCoding),
00081     sm_default_msg_id_(smDefaultMsgId),
00082     defaultBroadcastAreaIdentifier_(false)
00083 {
00084     Header::update_length(service_type_.length() +
00085                            source_addr_.address().length() +
00086                            message_id_.length() +
00087                            schedule_delivery_time_.length() +
00088                            validity_period_.length());
00089 
00090     // insert the tlvs using their mutate operations.
00091     insert_tlv(broadcastAreaIdentifier);
00092     insert_tlv(broadcastContentType);
00093     insert_16bit_tlv(Smpp::Tlv::broadcast_rep_num, broadcastRepNum);
00094     insert_tlv(broadcastFrequencyInterval);
00095 }
00096 
00099 Smpp::BroadcastSm::BroadcastSm(const Smpp::Uint8* b) :
00100     Request(CommandLength(MinLength), CommandId(CommandId::BroadcastSm), 1)
00101 {
00102     decode(b);
00103 }
00104 
00105 Smpp::BroadcastSm::~BroadcastSm()
00106 {
00107 }
00108 
00112 const Smpp::Uint8*
00113 Smpp::BroadcastSm::encode()
00114 {
00115     buff_.reset(Header::command_length());
00116 
00117     Request::encode(buff_); // insert the header first
00118     buff_ += service_type_;
00119     buff_ += source_addr_;
00120     buff_ += message_id_;
00121     buff_ += priority_flag_;
00122     buff_ += schedule_delivery_time_;
00123     buff_ += validity_period_;
00124     buff_ += replace_if_present_flag_;
00125     buff_ += data_coding_;
00126     buff_ += sm_default_msg_id_;
00127 
00128     Header::encode_tlvs(buff_);
00129 
00130     return buff_.get();
00131 }
00132 
00136 void
00137 Smpp::BroadcastSm::decode(const Smpp::Uint8* buff)
00138 {
00139     Request::decode(buff);
00140 
00141     Smpp::Uint32 len = Request::command_length();
00142     Smpp::Uint32 offset = 16;
00143     const char* err = "Bad length in broadcast_sm";
00144     if(len < offset)
00145         throw Error(err);
00146 
00147     const Smpp::Char* sptr = reinterpret_cast<const Smpp::Char*>(buff);
00148 
00149     service_type_ = sptr + offset;
00150     offset += service_type_.length() + 1;
00151     if(len < offset)
00152         throw Error(err);
00153 
00154     source_addr_.decode(buff+offset, len - offset);
00155     offset += source_addr_.address().length() + 3; // ton + npi + '\0'
00156     if(len < offset)
00157         throw Error(err);
00158 
00159     message_id_ = sptr+offset;
00160     offset += message_id_.length() + 1;
00161     if(len < offset)
00162         throw Error(err);
00163 
00164     priority_flag_ = buff[offset];
00165     ++offset;
00166     if(len < offset)
00167         throw Error(err);
00168 
00169     schedule_delivery_time_ = sptr + offset;
00170     if(len < offset)
00171         throw Error(err);
00172 
00173     offset += schedule_delivery_time_.length() + 1;
00174     if(len < offset)
00175         throw Error(err);
00176 
00177     validity_period_ = sptr + offset;
00178     if(len < offset)
00179         throw Error(err);
00180 
00181     offset += validity_period_.length() + 1;
00182     if(len < offset)
00183         throw Error(err);
00184 
00185     replace_if_present_flag_ = buff[offset];
00186     ++offset;
00187     if(len < offset)
00188         throw Error(err);
00189 
00190     data_coding_ = buff[offset];
00191     ++offset;
00192     if(len < offset)
00193         throw Error(err);
00194 
00195     sm_default_msg_id_ = buff[offset];
00196     ++offset;
00197     if(len < offset)
00198         throw Error(err);
00199 
00200     Header::decode_tlvs(buff + offset, len - offset);
00201 
00202     // check mandatory TLVs are present (order is not important)
00203     if(!find_tlv(Tlv::broadcast_area_identifier)     ||
00204         !find_tlv(Tlv::broadcast_content_type)       ||
00205         !find_tlv(Tlv::broadcast_rep_num)            ||
00206         !find_tlv(Tlv::broadcast_frequency_interval))
00207         throw Smpp::Error("Missing mandatory TLV parameter");
00208 }
